vlive.korean: 왜요? - 크림 때문에 - 아직 흡수가 안 돼서? Why. - Because of the lotion. - It's not absorbed yet? 듣기 View video IZ*ONE : 🐱🐹🐿🦋🍞🐰
vlive.english: Why. - Because of the lotion. - It's not absorbed yet?

vlive.korean: 금방 흡수됐죠? It got absorbed really fast, right? 듣기 View video HANABONO : 화장솜 없이 클렌징워터로만 세안하기 간증 붉은기 확잡음 feat스킨케어템소개 Using cleansing water without cotton pad
vlive.english: It got absorbed really fast, right?

vlive.korean: 어떻게 내가 위로를 받고 흡수할 수 있을까? How can I be consoled and absorbed? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 현진이의 고민상담소 다섯번째❣️
vlive.english: How can I be consoled and absorbed?

vlive.korean: 흡수시켜주고 뭔가... 뭐라 하죠? I absorb it into my skin... What do you say? 듣기 View video VICTON : 1001일 기념 숩숩이 브이앱:)
vlive.english: I absorb it into my skin... What do you say?

vlive.korean: [끈적임, 유분기 없이 흡수가 쏴악!] [Soaked it all up without stickiness or oiliness!] View video HANABONO : 벨라수X하나보노 환절기 홈케어로 탄력&리프팅 관리하는 법
vlive.english: [Soaked it all up without stickiness or oiliness!]

examples.korean: the absorption of immigrants into the host country 발음듣기 이민을 받아들이는 국가로의 이민 흡수 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: the absorption of immigrants into the host country 발음

examples.korean: This tennis racket absorbs shock on impact. 발음듣기 이 테니스 라켓은 공이 부딪힐 때 충격을 흡수한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: This tennis racket absorbs shock on impact. 발음

examples.korean: These changes were gradually assimilated into everyday life. 발음듣기 이 변화들은 서서히 일상생활에 흡수되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: These changes were gradually assimilated into everyday life. 발음

examples.korean: a material that is designed to absorb/retain moisture 발음듣기 습기를 흡수하도록/함유하고 있도록 만든 직물 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: a material that is designed to absorb/retain moisture 발음

examples.korean: The country simply cannot absorb this influx of refugees. 발음듣기 이 나라는 이렇게 밀려드는 난민을 그저 흡수할 수가 없다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The country simply cannot absorb this influx of refugees. 발음
